post:
FtpIt is a privately-held professional hosting company founded in Ohio, USA. We are a leading provider of un-managed VPS hosting. We provide hosting solutions and technology to successful individuals, entrepreneurs and small to medium-sized business around the globe.
    
    We are giving away 2 2GB RAM vps and one atom dedicated server free on July 30 , 2014

3 Lucky Winners Will Be Announced On July 30.Selection is random via woobox

    
    Step 1) Like the page https://www.facebook.com/FtpIt
    Step 2) Like and Comment in the post https://t.co/9t4JJ5R0cB
    Step 3) Share the post On Your fb wall.
    
The plans that are being offered free

Atom dedicated server Free for 2 months (renewal price is only 49/month)
https://secure.ftpit.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=80

2GB RAM vps free for six months (renewal price is only 4.99/month)
https://secure.ftpit.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=4

Good Luck to everyone!
